## unbiasedpoisson

### Installation

The package can be installed from R via:
```{r install, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pierrejacob/unbiasedpoisson")
```

It depends on the packages Rcpp, RcppEigen, lubridate, which can be installed via:
```{r installdependencies, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c("Rcpp", "RcppEigen", "lubridate"))
```
